模块 org.overrun.swgl.core
程序包 org.overrun.swgl.core.gui.font

类 SwglEasyFont

java.lang.Object
org.overrun.swgl.core.gui.font.SwglEasyFont
public class SwglEasyFont extends Object
Bitmap font for use in 3D APIs:
  • Easy-to-deploy
  • ASCII-only
从以下版本开始:
0.1.0
作者:
squid233

      public static SwglEasyTextDesc createTextDesc(int x, int y, String text)
      Creates a text descriptor.
      参数:
      x - the position x on the left-top
      y - the position y on the left-top
      text - the text
      返回:

      public static int getHeight(char c)
      Get the height of the char.
      参数:

      返回:

    • getHeight

      public static int getHeight(String text)
      Get the height of the text. Supported to line separators.
      参数:
      text - the text
      返回:
      the max height of the text
